const USER_DATATYPE = 'myDatatype';
const RULE_DATA_NAME = 'myRuleData';

const MYFORM_CONFIG = {
    "id":"myForm",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "type": "Form",
    "configuration": {
		"title": "Sample Form generated by APAF",
		"class": "form-frame-noborder",
		"fields": [
        	{
				"name": "fieldName",
				"label": "fieldLabel",
				"type": "select",
				"required": true,
				"size": 5,
				"datasource": {
					"type": "managed",
					"manager": "ruleDataManager",
					"payload": {"selector": {"name": {"$eq": RULE_DATA_NAME}}},
					"adapter": "@.length>0?@[0].values:[]"
				},
				"renderer": {
					"label": {"type": "PrimitiveTypeItemRenderer"},
					"value": {"type": "PrimitiveTypeItemRenderer"}
				}
			},
			{
				"name": "anotherFieldName",
				"label": "anotherFieldLabel",
				"type": "relationship",
				"size": 10,
				"multiple": false,
				"required": true,
				"datatype": USER_DATATYPE,
				"siteId_": "optional",
				"renderer": "/* use @ in the rendering expression to represent the data object */",
				"sortOn": "sort-field-name",
				"unique": true
			},
			{
				"name": "myPluggable",
				"label": "My Pluggable",
				"type": "pluggable",
				"siteId_": "optional",
				"size": 7,
				"requires": [
					{"type": "js","uri": "/apaf-workspace/binaryFile/Q3VzdG9taXphdGlvbnMvL215UGx1Z2dhYmxlRWRpdG9yLmpz"}
				],
				"editor": "custom.MyPluggableEditor"
			},
			{
				"name": "fieldName",
				"label": "fieldLabel",
				"type": "ruleDataReference",
				"ruleData": RULE_DATA_NAME,
				"required": false,
				"size": 3,
				"siteId_": "optional",
				"sortStrategy": "desc"
	         }
 		]
    }
}
